tool_description:
VietnamWorks APIs provide various abilities such as:

1) User Management
2) Job Search
3) Apply for a job
4) Matching Score Calculation

To be able to use these APIs you will need a consumer key which you can apply (http://www.vietnamworks.com/contact-us/feedback) for it by filling this request form and remember to choose API Consumer Key as your topic.
name: VietnamWorks Job Seeker Portal
title: VietnamWorks Job Seeker Portal

api_list.name: Job Search

optional_parameters.name: job_location
optional_parameters.description: (Maximum is 3) list of city ids which can be found in https://api-staging.vietnamworks.com/general/configuration/

optional_parameters.name: job_category
optional_parameters.description: (Maximum is 3) list of industry ids which can be found in https://api-staging.vietnamworks.com/general/configuration/

optional_parameters.name: job_level
optional_parameters.default: level of the job such as experienced, or manager ...

optional_parameters.name: job_benefit
optional_parameters.description: (Maximum is 3) list of industry ids which can be found in https://api-staging.vietnamworks.com/general/configuration/

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.default: number of records in one page

api_list.name: /general/configuration/
api_list.description: Access to the metadata of our system
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chrisshayan-vietnamworks-job-seeker-portal-v1.p.rapidapi.com/general/configuration/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chrisshayan-vietnamworks-job-seeker-portal-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chrisshayan-vietnamworks-job-seeker-portal-v1.p.rapidapi.com/general/configuration/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chrisshayan-vietnamworks-job-seeker-portal-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
